title: Truth & Power: Men of Magic Book Two
description: “Still think you’re the good guys?”The Bureau have Selena and things don’t feel right. With their restrictors removed, the unfaltering trust Kipling and Hemingway have in the Men of Magic might be damaged beyond repair. Elba still can’t quite believe that Kipling is hers. Sweet, gorgeous and incredible in bed—he’s too good to be true.As Elba navigates this fledgling relationship, she realises that while Kip might be experienced in the bedroom, trust is not his strong point and it might just be the thing that breaks them.Join Elba, Kipling & Hemingway as they try to find out what the Bureau is really up to and whether they’re really on the right side of magic . . .This book is for 18+ and contains language some might find offensive as well as explicit sexual content.
author: Addison Arrowdell
